title: Dawn of Defiance
description: The final book in the trilogy.Defiance Gray has never known what it is to love. She’s never felt safe. She’s never been happy. Faith was a luxury she could never afford. Meeting Uriel changed all of that. However, everything’ she’s grown to know is threatened when Defiance and Uriel are captured by the High Church. At the mercy of Father Judas, Defiance will learn that those who don’t earn redemption are destined to Fall. And that sometimes, the damned just can’t be saved.
author: Adrianne Brooks
